translations.name: Chinese Living Bible
translations.description: The Chinese New Living Translation is a dynamic equivalent Chinese New Testament translation published in paperback in Hong Kong by Chinese Bible International in 2004 and revised in 2006. The base text is the English New Living Translation with comparison with the Greek originals.
